5Helpers #permalink

helper classes and systems

5.1%clearfix #permalink

clear's both sides of the element in an intelligent way. used via @extend %clearfix

5.2%visuallyhidden #permalink

hides the text from view but maintains text-reader readability

5.3@mixin element-styles #permalink

  • @content
    the style to add to each in the list

for each element in $element-list, sets the style in a way that maintains the cascade -> low selectability

5.4@mixin header-styles #permalink

  • @content
    the style to add to each header

for each header, sets the style in a way that maintains the cascade -> low selectability

5.5@mixin rectangle #permalink

  • $width
    width of the element
  • $height
    height of the element

sets width and height based on parameters

5.6@mixin square #permalink

  • $dim
    side length of the square

sets width and height to be equal to the parameters
